    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602070.8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>MELT-04602070.8</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Die Fünf Säulen des Islam - Quiz</string>
            <string language="en">The five Pillars of Islam - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les cinq piliers de l'Islam - jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As cinco colunas do islam - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le cinque colonne di Islam - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι πέντε Στυλοβάτες του Ισλάμ - διαγωνισμός 
γνώσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los cinco pilares del Islam - concurso</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Im Wettbewerb beantworten Schülerinnen und Schüler Fragen zu den Fünf Säulen des Islam. Je nach Schwierigkeitsgrad der Frage werden unterschiedlich viele Punkte vergeben.</string>
            <string language="en">Contesting students answer questions on the five Pillars of Islam. Depending on the difficulty of the question different score amounts are possible.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Islam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Weltreligion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Islam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">World religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants de contestation répondent à des 
questions sur les cinq piliers de l'Islam. Dépendre de la 
difficulté des différents montants de points de question sont 
possible.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes contestando respondem a perguntas 
nas cinco colunas do islam. Dependendo da dificuldade da 
contagem diferente da pergunta as quantidades são possíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi di contestazione rispondono alle 
domande sulle cinque colonne di Islam. Secondo la 
difficoltà del segno differente di domanda gli importi sono 
possibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αμφισβητώντας σπουδαστές απαντούν στις ερωτήσεις 
στους πέντε Στυλοβάτες του Ισλάμ. Ανάλογα με τη 
δυσκολία της ερώτησης τα διαφορετικά ποσά αποτελέσματος είναι 
δυνατά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes que disputan contestan a 
preguntas sobre los cinco pilares del Islam. Dependiendo de la 
dificultad de diversa cuenta de la pregunta las cantidades son 
posibles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Islam</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
